# Verify a default configuration for the compact topology on external, non oci platform name

exec openshift-install agent create image --dir $WORK

stderr 'The rendezvous host IP \(node0 IP\) is 192.168.111.20'

exists $WORK/agent.x86_64.iso
exists $WORK/auth/kubeconfig
exists $WORK/auth/kubeadmin-password
isocmp agent.x86_64.iso /etc/assisted/manifests/agent-cluster-install.yaml expected/agent-cluster-install.yaml

-- install-config.yaml --
apiVersion: v1
baseDomain: test.metalkube.org
controlPlane:
  name: master
  replicas: 3
compute:
- name: worker
  replicas: 0
metadata:
  namespace: cluster0
  name: ostest
networking:
  clusterNetwork:
  - cidr: 10.128.0.0/14
    hostPrefix: 23
  networkType: OVNKubernetes
  machineNetwork:
  - cidr: 192.168.111.0/24
  serviceNetwork:
  - 172.30.0.0/16
platform:
  external:
    platformName: some-cloud-provider
sshKey: ssh-rsa 
pullSecret: '{"auths": {"quay.io": {"auth": "c3VwZXItc2VjcmV0Cg=="}}}'

-- agent-config.yaml --
apiVersion: v1alpha1
metadata:
  name: ostest
  namespace: cluster0
rendezvousIP: 192.168.111.20

-- expected/agent-cluster-install.yaml --
apiVersion: extensions.hive.openshift.io/v1beta1
kind: AgentClusterInstall
metadata:
  annotations:
    agent-install.openshift.io/install-config-overrides: '{"platform":{"external":{"platformName":"some-cloud-provider"}}}'
  name: ostest
  namespace: cluster0
spec:
  clusterDeploymentRef:
    name: ostest
  external:
    platformName: some-cloud-provider
  imageSetRef:
    name: openshift-was not built correctly
  networking:
    clusterNetwork:
    - cidr: 10.128.0.0/14
      hostPrefix: 23
    machineNetwork:
    - cidr: 192.168.111.0/24
    networkType: OVNKubernetes
    serviceNetwork:
    - 172.30.0.0/16
    userManagedNetworking: true
  platformType: External
  provisionRequirements:
    controlPlaneAgents: 3
  sshPublicKey: ssh-rsa 
status:
  debugInfo:
    eventsURL: ""
    logsURL: ""
  progress:
    totalPercentage: 0
